entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of snow beginning this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
